analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is crucial to investigate and resolve the issues causing the longer duration.
insights: The pricing page and blog page have the best performance, with load times under 300ms.
The time to first byte (TTFB) is generally low across all pages, indicating that the server response time is adequate.
The first contentful paint (FCP) is consistent across all pages, suggesting that the initial rendering of content is not significantly delayed.
